tls:text.tls:srcline: 「京城大德皆令布施、持戒、忍辱、苦行等求佛，
tls:text.tls:line: "The persons of great virtue of the capital all cause [us] to search for Buddha by giving alms, keeping the precepts, patience and practicing hardship (i.e. asceticism).

sense.def: BUDDH: to engage in ascetic practices, practice hardship (self-inflicted suffering in order to gain liberation; in the Buddhist context often used negatively since it can refer to excessive ascetic practices which do not conform to the 'Middle-way'); skr. dūkara-caryā; dhuta; vrata-tapa (see also toútuó 頭陀)
